name: Bolt'n'Punch
storyline: Taking a break in the employee’s room, Lyft is unaware of the danger that is to come her way. An intercom resonates throughout the room. A friendly voice calls out to Lyft, asking her to meet with the CEO, noting that it’s an emergency. She heads out of the room but is met with one of the worker’s, attacking her on the spot. She defends herself and wonders what’s going on. Heading further in, she gets locked inside the R&D. Fortunately for her, Fish Tank, her friendly companion, appears in the adjacent room and reassures her that he’s here to help. Lyft fends off waves of robot workers while Fish Tank breaks through the security system.
summary:
Exploring a disarrayed food factory, play as Lyft and fight your way through this chaos using powerful abilities. Face off against relentless robots and bring them to pieces. There’s only one option left to stop them; Destroy them, throw them, PUNCH 'EM!

Food for Thought strives to deliver the best food products to the common people, but when its robot workers turn against Lyft, the last human in the factory, she has to step up and punch some steel. Uncover the truth behind this attack, find your boss for answers, and put an end to this with style and power.
